title: Now Trending at Kroger: Autumn Beauty Routine Shake Up
description: The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR), America's grocer, is sharing the season's most anticipated fall beauty trends with a lineup of new wellness, beauty and makeup products hitting the aisles.
content:
Retailer shares upcoming beauty trends and highlights new items hitting the shelves

CINCINNATI, Sept. 3, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- The Kroger Co. (NYSE: KR), America's grocer, is sharing the season's most anticipated fall beauty trends with a lineup of new wellness, beauty and makeup products hitting the aisles.

"As the seasons change, grocery hauls are not the only routines getting the fall treatment," said Kate Meyer, Kroger Health & Beauty Care vice president. "This time of year, we see our customers reaching for soft tones, warm scents and extra facial hydration, alongside ingredients for cozy meals and savory dishes. Your beauty refresh has never been easier when shopping at Kroger."

Soft and Earthy Tones: This fall, makeup trends are shifting towards a more subdued and natural look with pops of unexpected color. Expect to see a rise in earthy and soft tones alongside pastel eyeshadow with holographic or shimmery toppers. Customers can achieve this trend by shopping the Australia clean beauty brand Nude by Nature, offering matte colors, nudes and muted tones and more, available exclusively at Kroger.

Bright Berry Lips: Lip color is making a vibrant statement this season with rich, saturated berry tones that blend drama and sophistication. From deep wine-inspired burgundies to vibrant raspberry hues, berry lip colors are emerging as the season's trend. A fan favorite returns to stores–Revlon Super Lustrous Lipstick Rum Raisin is back in the Revlon lineup with the same formula as before and even more moisture.

Warm and Nutty Scents: It went viral for a reason, and now eos is back with a fresh fall scent with notes of toasted pistachio, vanilla toffee and blonde woods. Introducing eos Crème de Pistachio Body Lotion—now in Kroger stores across the country. Layer with Dove Shea Butter and Vanilla Body Wash, Dove Exfoliating Macadamia and Rice Milk Body Scrub or a final touch of MIX:BAR Vanilla Bourbon Hair and Body Mist.

Signature Sunscreens: Sunscreen is always on trend, regardless of the season. Even as the weather cools down, the sun's harmful UV rays are still potent. Find all types of facial sunscreen at Kroger including Kroger Gimme Some Glow Sunscreen Lotion, Kroger Refreshing Setting Mist Sunscreen SPF 40 and more.

Introducing KBeauty: Korean beauty brands have been on the rise for years and will continue to remain on customers' shopping lists this fall. These beauty products are known for their innovative formulas, focus on hydration and use of natural ingredients. A popular line of KBeauty products include COSRX and their best-selling Advanced Snail Mucin Gel Cleanser. Find additional KBeauty products at Kroger throughout the year.

shortSummary: Kroger highlights upcoming fall beauty trends with new products like Nude by Nature, eos Crème de Pistachio Body Lotion, and KBeauty for a variety of reasons.
argos_summary: Kroger is launching a new fall beauty lineup featuring soft earthy tones, bright berry lip colors, warm nutty scents, and signature sunscreens. The store highlights Korean beauty brands like COSRX and Australian clean beauty brand Nude by Nature, along with popular items such as Revlon Super Lustrous Lipstick Rum Raisin. The focus is on natural, hydrating products and seasonal scents like eos Crème de Pistachio Body Lotion. Kroger aims to make a beauty refresh convenient for shoppers during the autumn season.
